name: Thayir Semiya Recipe (Curd Semiya)
description: Thayir Semiya or Curd Vermicelli is a quick dish which you can make for lunch. If you are bored of eating curd rice everyday, you can always make this Thayir semiya or curd semiya for a change. In South India, people consume curd everyday.
ingredients: "1/2 cup Semiya (Vermicelli), roasted","1 cup Curd (Dahi / Yogurt)","1 teaspoon Mustard seeds (Rai/ Kadugu)","1/2 teaspoon White Urad Dal (Split)","Pinch Asafoetida (Hing)","1 sprig Curry leaves","2 teaspoon Oil","Raw Peanuts (Moongphali)","5 to 6 Cashew nuts, for garnishing"
instructions: Boil vermicelli in 2 cups water. Drain and rinse with cold water to prevent stickiness. Keep aside. Heat oil in a pan
column10: roast peanuts till brown. Remove and set aside. In the same pan
column12: allow to splutter. Add other tempering ingredients. Add boiled vermicelli
column15: add curd and mix well. Serve as a light and healthy meal.""

name: Chettinad Style Kara Kuzhambu Recipe with Potato and Brinjal
description: Chettinad Style Kara Kuzhambu Recipe with Potato and Brinjal is a finger-licking good recipe made the Chettinad way.
ingredients: "1/4 teaspoon Methi Seeds (Fenugreek Seeds)","2 teaspoons Coriander Seeds","1 teaspoon Fennel Seeds","2 Dry Red Chillies","1/4 cup Fresh Coconut, grated","1/2 cup Pearl Onions, quartered","5 cloves Garlic, finely chopped","2 Tomatoes, finely chopped","2 Potatoes, cut into medium pieces","2 Brinjal, cut into wedges","1 tablespoon Jaggery","1 cup Tamarind Water","1 teaspoon Sambar Powder","1 teaspoon Gingelly Oil","1/2 teaspoon Mustard Seeds","2 sprigs Curry Leaves"
column13: roast for 2-3 mins. Blend into a smooth paste. In a pressure cooker
column22: and salt. Pressure cook for 3 whistles. In another pan
column25: curry leaves. Add this tempering and ground masala to cooked vegetables. Boil for 3-4 minutes. Serve hot with rice.""

name: Goan Chana Ros Recipe (White Peas Curry)
description: Goan Chana Ros is a vegetarian dish from Goan cuisine made with dried white peas (safed vatana).
ingredients: "1/2 cup Dried White Peas, soaked overnight","1/2 Onion, chopped","3 tablespoon Fresh Coconut, grated","4 Dry Red Chillies","1-1/2 teaspoon Coriander Seeds","3 Cloves","1 inch Tamarind","1/2 teaspoon Turmeric Powder","Salt to taste"
instructions: Soak white peas overnight. Pressure cook with onions for 4-5 whistles. Dry roast coriander
column11: and cloves. Blend with coconut and tamarind into a smooth paste. Heat a pan
column15: and cook for 10 minutes. Serve with hot rice.""

name: Minced Meat And Egg Croquettes Recipe
description: A delicious appetiser made with minced meat and whole boiled eggs.
ingredients: "500 grams Mutton, minced","4 Whole Eggs, boiled","1 Onion, finely chopped","1 teaspoon Ginger Garlic Paste","1 tablespoon Red Chilli Powder","1 teaspoon Turmeric Powder","1 teaspoon Cumin Powder","1-1/2 teaspoon Coriander Powder","Salt to taste","1 tablespoon Oil","2 tablespoon All Purpose Flour","2 Whole Eggs, beaten","1/4 cup Whole Wheat Bread Crumbs","Oil for deep frying"
column13: and minced meat. Cook for 30 minutes until dry. Divide into portions. Flatten
column15: cover with meat. Shape into croquettes. Roll in flour
column17: coat with bread crumbs. Deep fry until golden brown. Serve hot.""

name: Thekera Tenga Recipe
description: A traditional Assamese sour curry made with potatoes and Thekera fruit.
ingredients: "4 Potatoes, thinly sliced","1 tablespoon Mustard Oil","1/4 teaspoon Turmeric Powder","1 tablespoon Rice Flour or 1 mashed potato","2 teaspoons Lemon Juice or 3-4 Thekera pieces soaked in water","Salt to taste","1 teaspoon Mustard Oil","1 teaspoon Panch Phoran Masala","4 Green Chillies, chopped","4 sprigs Coriander Leaves, chopped"
instructions: Shallow fry potato slices. Heat oil
column13: turmeric. Mix rice flour with water
column15: add lemon juice or Thekera water. Add potatoes
column16: cook for 5 minutes. Garnish with coriander. Serve with rice.""
